text: Best way to create a simple python web service
I've been using python for years, but I have little experience with python web programming.
I'd like to create a very simple web service that exposes some functionality from an existing python script for use within my company.
It will likely return the results in csv.
What's the quickest way to get something up?
If it affects your suggestion, I will likely be adding more functionality to this, down the road.
